item.title: Game 4: Not a King yet
item.description:
Summary

This game was a good pratice for my King’s Indian Defense. My opponent knew the opening well, which is rare, and I couldn’t quite remember all the idea.

I lost a knight early on in exchange for nice activity which lead me to a winning endgame. But don’t be fooled by the result, my showing was all but controlled.
